body.p: Terms that have no substance are disregarded. A term has no substance if it has no discernible effect on the economics of the contract. Terms that have no substance could include, for example:

li.p: terms that bind neither party; or
rights, including options, that the holder will not have the practical ability to exercise in any circumstances.
